string-array.name: test_results_blurb_array
string-array.item: Lower than random chance would predict. Don\'t buy a lottery ticket today.
The important thing is that you tried.
You would make a great politician with polls like this!
Well, it\'s better than I expected of you.
What does it feel like? Being average?
Good job! You did as well as my goldfish!
Wow! What a high score! What are you trying to compensate for?
A perfect score? I was just going easy on you.
